head.supplied: [List of seeds that the Sociedad Rural Argentina has received per steamship ¶ Tiber ¶ , sent by Mr. Von Mueller, Director of the Botanical Garden of Melbourne (Australia)]...

div.p:
Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Semillas de Australia' [Australian seeds], Anales de la Sociedad Rural Argentina, 1873, vol. 7, pp. 50-1. The text is followed by a note dated Buenos Aires, February 1873, comprising a list of 80 species and details of the arrangements for distribution by the Secretary, together with some culture notes. It is not clear whether any or all of this material paraphrases information supplied by M. The letter is dated to October 1872 as the latest likely date that the consignment could have been sent from Melbourne to London in time to be transferred to Tiber, which sailed for South America from Southampton on 24 December 1872 (Yorkshire post and Leeds intelligencer , 26 September 1872, p. 2).
[Lista de las semillas que ha recibido la Sociedad Rural Argentina por el vapor Tiber, enviadas por el Sr. Von Mueller, Director del jardin Botánico de Melbourne (Australia)]

p.seg: [List of seeds that the Sociedad Rural Argentina has received per steamship
, sent by Mr. Von Mueller, Director of the Botanical Garden of Melbourne (Australia)]
